name: Episcopal Community Services (ECS)
description: Episcopal Community Services of San Francisco (ECS) helps homeless and very low-income people every day and every night to obtain the housing, jobs, shelter, and essential services each person needs to prevent and end homelessness.
fullDescription: Episcopal Community Services of San Francisco (ECS) helps homeless and very low-income people every day and every night to obtain the housing, jobs, shelter, and essential services each person needs to prevent and end homelessness.
whatTheyOffer: Episcopal Community Services of San Francisco (ECS) helps homeless and very low-income people every day and every night to obtain the housing, jobs, shelter, and essential services each person needs to prevent and end homelessness.
